result.title: Easter eggs in the system testing
result.content:
I've always wondered whether there are secret Easter eggs in the system testing. While it's true that the first few tests are usually legible, the next few tests are... "illegible"

For those who don't know, it translates to: "Being a woman is awesome".

(If you want proof that this is real, it's problem 598B.)

I have no idea if there are eggs that are actually "hidden" by CodeForces themselves, or if Harbour.Space University was just messing with us.

LIST OF EGGS:

  • The one I mentioned in the post.

  • If you find any, share the eggs in the comments. But don't drop 'em.
